navevents.name: onNavLogoClick
navevents.description: Fire when nav bar logo is clicked

propertiesitem.name: position-center
propertiesitem.description: Show the content in center. <amexio-nav-item position-center></amexio-nav-item>.

propertiesitem.name: position-left
propertiesitem.description: Show the content left side .<amexio-nav-item position-left></amexio-nav-item>.

propertiesitem.name: position-right
propertiesitem.description: Show the content right side. <amexio-nav-item position-right></amexio-nav-item>.

propertiesitem.name: type
propertiesitem.description: Indicate the type of menu-items (link / button / textfield /menu/menucontainer ) For Advance development use (menucontainer) for custom dropdown menu you can used in navbar.

propertiesitem.name: title
propertiesitem.description: Title for link, button and menu header

propertiesitem.name: icon
propertiesitem.description: Icon for link, button and menu header

propertiesitem.name: data
propertiesitem.description: Standard JSON format array data which is used for rendering menus. This is used when type=menu is defined.

events.name: onNavItemClick
events.description: Fire when nav item is clicked, This event is fired when nav item type is defined as 'link/button/menu'
